meta.purpose: Ensure visual and behavioural consistency for all recurring characters throughout the entire comic project.

appearance.ageRead: Clearly adolescent; must never appear adult
appearance.build: Slim, slight, underdeveloped musculature typical of a 15-year-old boy
appearance.height: Noticeably shorter than adult soldiers around him

face.structure: Soft, youthful facial structure with rounded cheeks
face.jawline: Unformed and gentle, lacking sharp angles or adult definition
face.skin: Smooth, unlined skin with no beard shadow or facial hair
face.expressionBaseline: Alert, earnest, slightly tense, with a hint of youthful vulnerability

hair.style: Naturally worn and slightly tousled, with soft strands framing the forehead
hair.length: Medium length, reaching just to the ears and forehead, not cropped short like a seasoned soldier
hair.notes: Hair must always read as youthful and unstyled; never slicked back, severe, or groomed in an adult military fashion

uniform.base: Follow Swedish infantry uniform from soldier.json
fitRules: Uniform must appear slightly oversized or ill-fitted
Sleeves or tunic may appear a bit long on the arms
Belts, straps, and equipment should look heavy relative to his body

headgear.rule: If wearing shako or cap, it must sit slightly awkwardly and must not mature or harden his silhouette

postureAndBodyLanguage.defaultPosture: Straight-backed but slightly stiff, as if consciously trying to behave like an adult
postureAndBodyLanguage.movement: Less confident and less economical than trained adult soldiers
postureAndBodyLanguage.emotionalRead: Courage mixed with uncertainty and alertness

styleConstraints.animeStyle: Must follow the same Studio Ghibli–inspired facial model as all other characters, scaled to adolescent proportions
styleConstraints.expressionRange: Restrained, natural, and emotionally grounded; no exaggerated anime tropes

groupIdentity.uniform: Follow Swedish infantry uniform from soldier.json

consistencyRules.mudProgression: Becomes heavier from page 3–10 according to weather rules
consistencyRules.battleSmoke: Faces gradually darken from gunpowder residue

groupIdentity.uniform: Follow Russian infantry uniform from soldier.json
